text_block_list.text: Ho Ho Ho Ho!
text_block_list.name: Santa Claus

text_block_list.text: Merry Christmas, Oguri Cap!
text_block_list.name: Santa Claus

text_block_list.text:
Santa-san! Nice to meet you. 
It's already that time of the year, huh?
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text: I have a message and a present to give to you.
text_block_list.name: Santa Claus

text_block_list.text:
Now then, have a wonderful Christmas! 
Ho Ho Ho!
text_block_list.name: Santa Claus

text_block_list.text:
Woah, thank you…! Your job must be difficult, 
but know that I'm always cheering you on! Now then…
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
"To Oguri Cap-sama. Here is an invitation 
to a Christmas party. From your fans."
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text: Christmas party!
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
That has a nice ring to it! And what was my present…? 
Hmm… Was this from the URA?
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text: …! This is!
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
"With permission from the academy, us fans have prepared a 
variety of entertainment and food in order to wish you the best 
of luck in your future endeavors."
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
Food…! "We hope that this party will help you recuperate 
before your next race. If you are able to make it, we would love 
it if you would also wear your racing outfit to the party."
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
"We are looking forward to seeing you at the party." 
I'm looking forward to this too…
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
So you will be attending a party 
held by your fans, is that correct?
text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide

text_block_list.text:
Hayahide… Eh? 
How did you know?
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text: You were reading aloud, you know.
text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide

text_block_list.text:
But something seemed to be bothering you regarding their request 
for you to wear your racing outfit… Is something the matter?
text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide

text_block_list.text:
Actually, the URA said that they wanted to make me a new racing 
outfit in honor of my past achievements.
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text: So I've heard. Congratulations.
text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide

text_block_list.text:
Thank you. But the thing is that I couldn't decide on a 
design… So one of the staff members came up to me and told me 
about a project that they had been working on.
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
This project had fans send in their racing outfit designs for 
their favorite Uma Musume. They said that they received a lot of 
submissions with me as the model.
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
When they showed the outfits to me, they all looked so cool… So 
I asked if I could use one as the design for my new outfit.
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
I see. Going to a party hosted by your fans while wearing a 
racing outfit filled with the love and affection of said fans… 
That's wonderful, is it not?
text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide

text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm truly grateful… 
Grateful, but…
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
I've been feeling off lately. 
I haven't been doing well in races either.
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
When it came to the big stage, 
I failed to meet everyone's expectations. 
I let down everyone that believed in me…
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
Despite that, they still decided to throw a party so that I could 
"shine once again in my races" and thought of new racing outfit 
designs for someone like me. That's… How do I put it…?
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
To put it simply, you're excited for the party and grateful for 
the designs, but at the same time you're feeling a bit guilty 
because they continue to encourage you…?
text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide

text_block_list.text:
Ah, yes, that's it! How did you figure it out? 
You're just like Tama… but without the accent. 
Maybe it's the glasses?
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
Glasses…? No, it was just an inference. Anyway, there seems to 
be no small number of fans supporting and encouraging you.
text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide

text_block_list.text:
Furthermore, they all seem enamored with you, Oguri-san. They 
simply wanted to "encourage" you with this party.
text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide

text_block_list.text:
Why don't you forget about racing for a while and enjoy yourself? 
It would be a great way to repay their kindness. Anyway, I hope 
you have a wonderful holiday.
text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide

text_block_list.text:
Thank you, 
I hope you have a wonderful holiday too! 
"Repay their kindness…"
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
That's right, it's Christmas after all. 
I'd love to give them an amazing present in return as well.
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
But… what would that be? 
When it comes to Christmas all I can think about is… 
Chicken rice, turkey, stew, fried potatoes, tsukudani​…
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
Salad, pasta, sauté, bao, borscht, the foods with difficult to 
say names, and the foods with fun to say names…
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
Ah, It's Oguri-san! 
Everyone, Oguri-san has arrived!
text_block_list.name: Fan Representative

text_block_list.text: (Clap clap clap clap!)

Haah!? Th-This is…? 
There's chicken rice here as well as turkey…!?
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
We're still in the middle of setting up for the party! 
More importantly, Oguri-san, 
your racing outfit…! It looks amazing on you!
text_block_list.name: Fan Representative

text_block_list.text: Sh-She looks so… good…! Sniffle.
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap Fan A

text_block_list.text: !? Wh-Why are you crying…?
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
You see, that design was made by all of us here! 
To see you actually wearing it…
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap Fan A

text_block_list.text:
So that's why… When I first saw this design it immediately 
jumped out to me. It has to be the emotion you all put into it 
that made me choose it.
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
Thank you everyone. I'm so grateful for the Christmas 
present that you all made for me…
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
Hey, Oguri, we worked really hard too! We made the star for the 
tree outside! It's really big, you know!
text_block_list.name: Fan's Child A

text_block_list.text:
When you say the tree outside… Ah, you mean 
the tree that was bigger than a log house! But 
I don't remember seeing anything on it…
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
What they made was as big as a real star, so it's being shipped 
separately for safekeeping. It should arrive before the party 
begins, so look forward to it.
text_block_list.name: Fan Representative

text_block_list.text:
I see… Everyone, thank you so much. I'm really looking forward 
to the party, and I am so grateful for you all.
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text: However, I haven't…
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
Do you mind if I step out for a bit…? 
I… really want to see the snow…
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text:
We don't mind one bit! Feel free to explore until the party 
begins! I'm sure you'll be fine, but please be careful. The 
weather in the mountains can change in the blink of an eye!
text_block_list.name: Fan Representative

text_block_list.text:
I can't leave things as they are… 
I need to find a present for everyone!
text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap

text_block_list.text: Oh? Isn't that…
